link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric http://www.xbrl.org/dtr/type/numeric-2009-12-16.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/entity http://www.xbrl.org/2008/entity-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/custom-function http://www.xbrl.org/2010/custom-function-implementation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd
link:linkbase.link:documentation: Business Reporting Rules for the Work In Process Taxonomy.

gen:link.label:label: Entity registrant name (dei:EntityRegistrantName) required in this component.
Current Fiscal Year End Date (dei:CurrentFiscalYearEndDate) required in this component.
Document Period End Date (dei:DocumentPeriodEndDate) required in this component.
Document Fiscal Year Focus (dei:DocumentFiscalYearFocus) required in this component.
Document Fiscal Period Focus (dei:DocumentFiscalPeriodFocus) required in this component.
Document Creation Date (dei:DocumentCreationDate) required in this component.
Concept revenues earned since inception foots (wip:ContractRevenueEarnedToDate).
Concept costs incurred since inception foots (wip:ContractCostsIncurredToDate).
Contract gross profit earned since inception foots (wip:ContractGrossProfitFromInceptionToDate).
Contract estimated costs to complete foots (wip:ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete).
Cost of revenue MUST never be negative.
Contract Revenue, yet to be Earned MUST never be negative.
Contract Costs, Estimated Cost to Complete MUST never be negative.
Billings in Excess of Costs and Estimated Earnings MUST never be negative.
Costs And Earnings In Excess Of Billings MUST never be negative.

va:valueAssertion.test: abs((($PercentageComplete * 100)) - (if($ContractCostsEstimatedCost ne 0) then ((1-($ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete div $ContractCostsEstimatedCost)) * 100) else 0)) le 1

gen:link.label:label: Percentage complete computation is correct.
gen:link.msg:message: Percent Complete (={$PercentageComplete}) must match the formula 1 - [Estimated Costs to Complete (={$ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete}) / Estimated Costs (={$ContractCostsEstimatedCost})] = {xfi:format-number((if($ContractCostsEstimatedCost ne 0) then (1-($ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete div $ContractCostsEstimatedCost)) else 0),'#.00')} in Contract No. {//wip:ContractNumber[xfi:fact-dimension-s-equal2(.,$PercentageComplete,xs:QName('wip:ContractNumberAxis')) and xfi:period-end(xfi:period(.)) eq xfi:period-end(xfi:period($PercentageComplete))]}

gen:link.label:label: Contract Work in Progress ContractRevenueEstimatedRevenue foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractCostsEstimatedCost foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractGrossProfitTotalContract foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractGrossProfitPercentTotalContract foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractRevenueEarnedToDate foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractCostsIncurredToDate foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractGrossProfitFromInceptionToDate foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractRevenueRevenueToComplete foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractCostsEstimatedCostToComplete foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractGrossProfitToBeEarned foot.
Contract Work in Progress Revenues foot.
Contract Work in Progress CostOfRevenue foot.
Contract Work in Progress GrossProfit foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractBillingsFromInceptionToDate foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractReceivableRetainage foot.
Contract Work in Progress BilledContractReceivables foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractGainFade foot.
Contract Work in Progress ContractPermanentJobBorrow foot.
Contract Work in Progress ProvisionForLossOnContracts foot.
Contract Work in Progress ProvisionForLossOnContracts foot.
Accounts receivable billed for long-term contracts or programs MUST never be negative.
Accounts receivable from retainage MUST never be negative.
Accounts receivable from non-retainage and retainage MUST never be negative.
Permanent job borrowings MUST never be negative.
Contract accrued loss MUST never be negative.
